en.purpose: To provide the recommended surveillance activities at specific time intervals post-operation in patients with diagnosed colorectal cancer.
en.use: Use to determine the surveillance schedule for patients operated for Stage II or III colorectal cancer or appendix neoplasia.
en.misuse:
Not to be used for Stage I patients. 

Not to be used for patients where comorbidities contraindicate treatment of recurrence.

Not to be used in other types of cancer.

$gt0003|Procedure|==local::at0018|Appendiceal neoplasia (LAMN/HAMN) with epithelial cells in free mucus.|
then: $gt0005|Follow up and interval|=local::at0010|CT thorax–abdomen and tumor markers (CEA, CA 125, CA 19-9, CA 15-3) at 6, 12, 18, and 24 months, then annually for years 3–5.|
